Variable.desc: Logger object used within the Spoon. Can be accessed to set the default log
Variable.doc:
Logger object used within the Spoon. Can be accessed to set the default log 
level for the messages coming from the Spoon.
Variable.name: logger
Variable.stripped_doc: level for the messages coming from the Spoon.

Variable.desc: Spacer specific log level override, see hs.logger.setLogLevel for options.
Variable.doc: Spacer specific log level override, see hs.logger.setLogLevel for options.
Variable.name: logLevel

Variable.desc: hs.menubar representing the menu bar for Spacer.
Variable.doc: hs.menubar representing the menu bar for Spacer.
Variable.name: menuBar

Variable.desc: Table with an ordered list of the space names, which is used when loading
Variable.doc:
Table with an ordered list of the space names, which is used when loading
the menubar, as well as persisted to and from hs.settings between loads.
Variable.name: orderedSpaceNames
Variable.stripped_doc: the menubar, as well as persisted to and from hs.settings between loads.

Variable.desc: Table holding an ordered list of space IDs, which is then used to resolve
Variable.doc:
Table holding an ordered list of space IDs, which is then used to resolve
actual space names for IDs from Spacer.spaceNames.
Variable.name: orderedSpaces
Variable.stripped_doc: actual space names for IDs from Spacer.spaceNames.

Variable.desc: Table with key-value mapping of Space ID to it's user set name.
Variable.doc: Table with key-value mapping of Space ID to it's user set name.
Variable.name: spaceNames

Variable.desc: hs.spaces.watcher instance used for monitoring for space changes.
Variable.doc: hs.spaces.watcher instance used for monitoring for space changes.
Variable.name: spaceWatcher

desc: Name and switch Mission Control spaces in the menu bar
doc:
Name and switch Mission Control spaces in the menu bar

Download: https://github.com/adammillerio/Spoons/raw/main/Spoons/Spacer.spoon.zip

Example Usage (Using [SpoonInstall](https://zzamboni.org/post/using-spoons-in-hammerspoon/)):
spoon.SpoonInstall:andUse(
  "Spacer",
  {
    start = true
  }
)

Space names can be changed from the menubar by holding Alt while selecting
the desired space to rename. These are persisted between launches via the
hs.settings module.
